attributes.action: Government action to ensure fair distribution of food for all esp. those in need
attributes.additional_details: The most vulnerable in society and key workers are being affected by shortages of basic human needs.
attributes.background: Food is currently being stockpiled in panic by those financially able and well. Vulnerable groups, those self isolating, key workers, those without financial means to stock pile are going without. The government MUST take urgent action to ensure food and essential supplies are fairly distributed.
